Room.Name: Foothills Trail
Room.ShortDescription: This is the lower trail which goes to the dwarven village of Nyyron.
Room.LongDescription: The dwarves don't mind visitors to their small community, so if this is your first time to their mining town, be sure to stop at the Hog's Breath Saloon for some good Uland rum and a talk with the bartender. He knows the complete history of the area.
